title: White Chocolate Macadamia Bread Pudding
directions: Combine the cream, milk, and the sugar in a large saucepan over medium-high heat and bring just to a boil. Add the white chocolate chips and remove from the heat. Let sit for 5 minutes, undisturbed, then whisk until the chocolate is completely dissolved.

Whisk the egg yolks and egg together in a large bowl. Whisk in 1 cup of the hot cream mixture, then gradually add the remaining cream mixture and whisk to blend. Add the macadamia nuts and the cubed bread and set aside to soak for 30 minutes.
Preheat the oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit and butter a large baking dish.

Transfer the bread pudding mixture to the prepared baking dish and bake in the center of the oven until the bread pudding is puffed, golden brown and set in the center, about 1 hour. Remove from the oven and cool briefly before serving with the Vanilla Bean Cr√®me Anglaise.
ingredients: 1/4 cup plus 2 tbsp. unsalted butter, cut into pieces
1/2 loaf day-old French bread, torn into rough pieces
